channel.title: Maximuming At The Peak
channel.description: Recent content on Maximuming At The Peak

item.title: The Train Schedule
item.description: The Train Schedule This website needs content. I don’t really know what to write at the moment so I’m going to just start with a simple recreation of a famous old ( originally made 137 years ago) visualization to get things rolling. I could have chosen to write about Napoleon’s infamous march but plenty of people wrote about that already. I recently purchased a copy of https://www.amazon.co.uk/Visual-Display-Quantitative-Information/dp/0961392142 by Edward Tufte.

item.title: About Me
item.description: My name is Troy. I am a data analyst based in London. Everything I write here represents my own thought and opinions. What does Peak Maximum mean? Not sure, one of my friends said something about taking something to the Peak Maximum and I thought it was funny and the domain name was available for $5.00 and I needed something to do.
